text: A red, dusty road in a mining town. A POLITICIAN (55) in a white shirt and pants who looks mo like a local hood, travels on top of a Jeep which has bee designed to look like a mythological chariot. The jeep mo through the market place. His 40 supporters are on 15 motorcycles bearing bandannas flags in his party color, yellow. They ride slowly in fro of the chariot shouting slogans.

Humara neta kaisa ho? Mangal Netam jaisa ho! Mangal Netam Zindabad! A couple of his supporters climb on the Jeep and garland He is already laden with a dozen garlands- all yellow marigolds. His supporters gesture at everyone to listen to him speak He addresses the crowd on a microphone.

(in mock anger) Mangal Netam aapke beech vote maangne nahi aaya hai. Mat do mujhe vote! Mat do! His supporters are silent. POLITICIAN (CONT’D) Woh log mujhe thekedar kehte hai. Mujhe? (calms down) Mujhe iss kshetra ka vikaas chahiye. Mera sapna hai ki har bacche ke daaye haath mein laptop aur baayein haath mein mobile ho. Aur woh log aapke aur vikaas ke beech ka kaanta hai. His supporters start cheering him to not give up. POLITICIAN (CONT’D) (thumps his chest) Magar yeh dharti ka poot aapke liye khada hai. Agar woh laal hai toh main kamaal hoon. Agar woh teer hai toh main top hoon. Isiliye main kehta hoon ki agar aap iss chetra ka vikaas chahte ho toh aapko pata hai ki aapko kya karna hai.

The Politician and his cronies travel in a car. He talks his cellphone. In front of them, the road is blocked by a fallen tree. A soon as the driver realizes it, everyone in the car panic he tries to frantically turn the car. As the driver tries to take a sharp U turn, eight uniform naxals(4 men, 4 women), their faces covered come out of t woods with guns, mostly 303s. The driver and bodyguard run out of the car begging them spare him. Mangal is frozen. When he turns back he sees both the dri and his bodyguard running away. A naxal woman opens the car door. A man pulls Mangal out the car, on the ground below. The woman pumps two bullets into him with her 303. Very economical. PROLOGUE: IN POST (Give background of the situation) 2A
An ELECTION COMMISSION OFFICER, P K MISHRA (50) is conduc a workshop for 40 men and women. There’s an EVM on the ta

India ka election duniya hairan hokar dekhti hai. Tees hazar karod ka kharcha, chaurasi karod voter, nabbe lakh polling booth. Har baar Guinness Book mein hum apna pichla world record tod ke ek naya record banate hai. Humne saabit kar diya hai ki hamari sansad mein goonde bhale hi chun ke aa jaaye magar chunaav mein goonda gardi nahi kar sakte. Kyun? Kyunki hum aur aap, Election commission ke chunav adhikaari, aisa hone nahi dete...
Chunav tak zinda rahenge tab na. Mishra looks stunned. Some people laugh.
Kaun bola? Saamne aaiye? Silence.
Murga nahi banayenge bhai... Laughter. Mishra regains his composure.

Dekhiye kal ki ghatna ke baad darr lagna swabhawik hai... It is human nature. Yeh pradesh Maowaad se grast hai. Kal ki ghatna se unhone chunav boycott ka elan kiya hai. Boycott! (pause) Maowaadi hamare samvidhaan aur prajatantra ko nahi maante. Jo Mao ne Cheen mein kiya woh unhe yahan karna hai. Maoji ka kehna tha ki rajnaitik shakti bandook ki nali se behti hai. Wahan bahi hogi, yahan nahi bahegi. Naksaliyon ko koi hathiyaar agar mita sakta hai to woh hathiyaar hai yeh VOTING MACHINE. Samjhe? A lady officer raises her hand with trepidation. Mishra looks at her.
Kya samjhe?
Sir, chunavi hinsa hui to? Mishra is getting a bit exasperated.

Awwaal to hogi nahi. Hui bhi to hum aapko kuch nahi hone denge. Har polling booth sensitive nahi hota. Jo log samvedansheel ilaako mein jayenge, jaise Dandkaranya jungle, unko poora security cover milega. Aap sirf free and fair election pe focus kare. Chaliye bataiye Chapter 1 point number 1.2 kya hai? A KEEN TYPE PROBATIONER, KTP, raises his hand. Mishra poi to him.
Sir, Presiding officer ka polling booth ke 200 metre ke radius mein poora control hoga. Sabko uska aadesh man-na hoga. Mishra lifts the manual.
Shabaash. Aap sabko bhi yeh manual ghot ke peena hai. Chunav ke din manual dekhne ki naubat nahi aani chahiye. Am I clear? An officer raises her hand.
Sir, agar polling booth pe Maowadiyon ka hamla hua to hum kya kare?
Hero bilkul mat ban-na. Jo bole kar dena. Chup-chap voting machine de dena. Hum uss booth ka chunav radd kar ke re election karvaenge.
Sir, agar re election mein bhi upadrav hua to?
To phir re election.
Aur sir, agar re election ke re election mein bhi gadbad hui to? Mishra is not impressed.
Kya naam hai aapka?
Ji, Newton Kumar.
Newton?
Newton.
Woh apple wala Newton?
Ji. Officers in the audience laugh.
Huh. Do ke baad kya aata hai?
Jee teen.
Teen ke baad?
Jee char.
Good boy. Baith jao. The group laughs again.
P.K. Mishra sits alone at a table eating. Newton enters the restaurant/ canteen. When he spots Mish he walks to him.
Kya sir? Simple doubt tha. Mazak bana diya aapne.
Sawaal aise poochogey toh jawaab bhi aise hi milege. Accha chhodo. Newton tumhara asli naam hai?
Ji.
Pitaji Physics padate hai? Newton looks at him askance.
Mera poochne se matlab tha ki ‘Newton’ naam kisne rakha.
Ji, khud maine. Mishra looks surprised.
Kyun?
Actually mera naam Nutan tha. Nutan Kumar. Class mein sab chedte the. Isliye tenth board ke form pe maine Nu ko New aur Tan ko Ton kar diya.
Nu ka New aur Tan ka Ton? Wah. Nutan ka Newton. Wah wah!. Yaar tum to kalakaar nikle!
Kyun?
Beta Newton naam bada bhari hai. (quoting Shakespeare) Greatness has been thrust upon you.
Kya sir... aap meri class le rahe ho?
Len-den se bhi upar ki baatein hoti hain. Suno ab. Pata hai Newton ne duniya kaise badli?
Sir padha hai. Gravity. Optics.
Itne saalon se aap Newton hain, asli baat toh pakad hi nahi paaye. Beta ek jhatke mein dharti aasmaan baraabar kar diya tha usne. Ab poochho kaise?
Kaise?
Hota kya tha ki purane zamane mein dharti ke alag aur aasman ke alag kanoon hotey the. Ek rule hota tha rajaon ke liye, ek rule hota tha hum jaison ke liye. Pata hai na?
Ji sir.

Lekin ek hi zhatke mein Newton ne duniya ke totey uda diye. Nature ke aagey koi raja nahin, koi fakeer nahi. Sab ke liye ek hi kanoon, chahe chand pe jao, Amrika jao, ya kahin mat jao, inertia mein raho. Jab kudrat Ambani aur bhikari mein bhed bhaav nahi karti, toh hum kaun hote hain? Samjhe?
(thinking deeply) Hmmm.
Kaunse department mein ho.
Abhi tak allocate nahi hua hoon. Probation par DM daftar mein hoon.
Phir election duty pe kaise ho?
Reserve mein hoon sir.
Twelfth man bhi zaroori hai. Jaise cricket-football mein. Maaza aa raha hai naukri mein?
Jee.
Bade bhari mann se Jee bol rahe ho.

Ajeeb sa mahoul hai saare daftar ka. Koi nakhoon kat-ta hai, koi patte khelta hai, koi din bhar oonghta rehta hai... bina rishwat koi file khiskaane ko raazi nahi hai... Gharwale aur rishteydaar alag pareshaan karte hai. Jab bhi milte hain upar ki kamai kitni hai poochte hain...
Dekho naya naya josh hai tum bhi seekh jaoge saal bhar mein. Shuru shuru mein sabko aise hi lagta hai.
Sir, sirf paise kamane thhe toh call centre mein naukri karta. I want to make a difference.
Tumhara problem pata hai kya hai?
(confrontational) Meri imaandaari?
Yeh imaandari ka ghamand. Dekho Newton babu aap imaandaar hokar desh samaj kissi pe ehsaan nahi kar rahe hai. It is expected of you. Samjhe? Newton listens.

Imaandaari se mann halka hota hai bandhu, bhaari nahi. Mat lo duniya ka load, sirf apna kaam karo. Desh ki pragati apne aap ho jaegi. Newton nods. Thinking deeply. Mishra waits for Newton to resurface. Newton gets up to leave.
Bhains aur bureaucrat main kya farak hai jaante ho? Newton looks askance.
Bhains gobar karne ki tankha nahi leti. Ab chalo. They laugh.
Itna saara gyan diya, paaon nahi chuogey? Newton smiles politely.
Sir, main paaon nahi choota.
Aajkal ke launde toh humare jaise hi hai! Mishra laughs. Newton forces a smile.
Suno. Shaadi hui hai?
Nahi sir.
Soch samajh ke karna. Yeh bhi ek prakaar ka seb hai.

A bird's eye view of the town. INT. LILA’S HOUSE- EVENING Traditional “Arranged Marriage” match making scenario. Newton’s parents have taken him to see a girl. They sit on a wooden sofa with cushions. In front of the the girl’s father, brother and a 90 year old grandmother thick glasses. There’s some noticeable disparity between his family and his are far simpler. GIRL’S FATHER Bhopal ke aage to yeh kasba sa lagta hoga nai? NEWTON’S FATHER Jahan bachha khush rahe apne liye to wahi Bhopal hai. GIRL’S FATHER Yeh sahi kahi aapne. Retirement ka sukh to baccho ke saath hi hai. Waise bhaisahab aap lagte nahi saath ke. NEWTON’S FATHER Abhi to siraf tireppan poore hue hai. Naukri lagte hi yeh ladne laga, Karwa diya retire! GIRL’S FATHER Sakshat Shravan Kumar hai apna Nutan.

Jee Newton. Her Grandma passes a framed cloth that has a bulbous rose embroidered on it. Newton’s mother looks at the embroider with interest. GIRL’S GRANDMA Bachpan se hi shauk hai. GIRL’s FATHER Beta ab tumhare roomal kabhi nahi khoyenge. Na koi chori kar paega. Sab par yeh tumhare woh initials kar degi. NEWTON’S MOTHER Haan, rumaal toh iske bade khotey hai. Newton doesn’t know how to react. Newton’s parents begin admire the embroidery. Newton’s attention is drawn towards the stairs where he c see some movement. The girl, LILA, nubile and demure ente Draped in a nice saree, she is escorted by her mother, si in law and older sister as she holds a tray of tea cups a pakodas.  10. She places the food before Newton and his family and sits down quietly next to her mother. Her head is bowed. GIRL’S FATHER Pakode khao, beta Nootan.

Newton. GIRL’S FATHER Beta itni English to mujhe aati nahi. Newton is about to say something when- GIRL’S MOTHER Chai lo beta. Makhi baith jaegi. She signals Lila with her eyes. Lila picks up the cup of around which a fly is hovering and hands it to Newton. Wh Newton takes a sip, a film of cream sticks to his lips. He cleans it awkwardly. Newton looks at Lila who looks uncomfortable. GIRL’S FATHER Beta kuch poochna hai bitiya se? ya sab shaadi ke baad? The parents laugh. Newton nervously keeps the cup on the table. NEWTON’S FATHER Kadai dekh li, pakode kha liye ab baat karne ko hai kya? Newton angrily looks at his father. His mother catches on GIRL’S FATHER Poochne do na. M.Sc. hai. Hogi koi baat. Pooch beta pooch. Newton clears his throat. He looks at Lila who is looking the ground.
Kya shauk rakhti hain aap?
Jee pichhur jaane ka shauk hai.
Sabse favourite kaunsi hai?
Jee Hum Aapke Hain Kaun.  11. Her parents nod with approval.
College mein ho? Lila shakes her head. GIRL’S FATHER Badmasho ke adde mein apni beti ko main to nahi bhejunga. Naam padhai ka kaam saara number do ka.
To aapne twelveth ke baad kya kiya?
Jee woh nauvi tak kiya. Newton looks at her father. He glares back.
Kab?
Jee teen saal pehle? Newton looks like he is doing a mental calculation.
Uss hisaab se to matlab aap matlab... Aapki age kya hui?
Jee. Saade solah. Newton gets up, frightfully.
Ladki nabaalig hai. GIRL’S FATHER Beta ladki sasuraal mein badi ho yehi aacha hai. Newton looks at his father with anger as if asking: what you gotten me involved in?

Two cycle rickshaws- on one, sits Newton, and on the othe sit his parents. Whenever Newton's rickshaw goes slightly ahead, his fathe tells his rider to buck up.  NEWTON’S FATHER To ek-ded saal mein ho jaegi baalig. Tab kar lena shaadi. Sasur contractor, damad afsar. Retirement tak ghee mein dooba rahega.
Mujhe nahi doobna ghee mein. NEWTON’S MOTHER Aise nahi bolte babu. Motorcycle aur paanch lakh nagdi denge.
Main nahi loonga. NEWTON’S FATHER Tujhe de kaun raha hai. Main loonga. Saala baap pe masteri jhaadta hai. (to rider) Tez chala! NEWTON’S MOTHER Chhodo na aap bhi.
Mujhe graduate ladki chahiye. NEWTON’S FATHER Apni degree kam hai kya chaatne ko jo uski bhi chaatega?

Graduate mein kya burai hai? NEWTON’S FATHER Graduate ladki dabaegi teri maa ke pair? Sarkari naukari kya lag gayi tu khud ko jameendar samajne laga? Kal kahega thakur brahman ke ghar byah do? Apni patloon mein reh. Newton’s rickshaw driver suddenly speeds up.

Main kabhi shaadi nahi karunga. NEWTON’S FATHER Beta yeh Dilip Kumar wala lehja daftar mein chaprasi pe chalana. Woh darega. Main tera baap hoon. INT. NEWTON’S HOME- NIGHT THEME MUSIC. Marimba plays.  10 11 12 13. Modest government quarters. Freshly white washed two room apartment. The whole colony is asleep. Newton stands in the balcony and looks out. He looks disturbed.
Newton is running, early in the morning. He’s dressed in white T-shirt, tracks and wears simple sports shoes. He stops and does stretches.

Newton diligently does his work at his office, which is f of dusty files. His colleagues are huddled around a table and are watchin cricket match on a cell phone. INT. NEWTON’S HOME- NIGHT 11 THEME MUSIC CONTINUES. Newton’s father and mother are watching a soap outside on older TV set. They look slightly out of place even in thi modest setting. His bookshelf- books like “You Can Win”, “Humara Samvidha “My experiments with truth”, books by Premchand, Ghalib, Republic by Plato, Principia Mathematica (or TYBSc Maths Physics textbooks). On his table lies the “Manual of Protocols for Presiding Officers of Polling Booth”. He opens it. He bites into a crisp apple and chews slowly as he studie diagrams of how the Electronic Voting Machine is operated INT. NEWTON’S HOME- DAY 12 Newton is in front of a small mirror that’s placed on his table. He combs his hair neatly. Once it looks neat and orderly, he shakes his head and gets the hair do he sport THEME MUSIC ends.  13 14.

Around 150 men and women are huddled in groups of 3-4, checking their polling materials. They are all carrying handbags. Presiding officers huddle around two large white-clothed tables with Table 1 officials giving them the EVMs and go over instructions and at Table 2, the Collector informing them about their polling booth. KTP stands in queue at Ta 1. Newton and a few other ‘Reserve’ officers are sitting a f feet away on a long bench. Some officers are on their pho some stare at the proceedings vacantly. Newton watches with the concentration of a benched player Table 1:
Kamal Kishore!
Yes sir! The COLLECTOR’s ASSOCIATE (local man in his 50's) looks a KTP and ticks his name in his list. He opens a plastic briefcase with the EVM. He hands over some papers in a file.
Check kariye.
Yes sir.
Control Unit aur Balloting Unit. He points to a smaller envelope. COLLECTOR'S ASSOCIATE (CONT’D) Isme kya hai jaante hain?
Yes sir. Iss mein hai hari seal, strip seal, stamp pad, form 17A, Form 17 C, statutory forms, aur syahi vagerah. The officer is impressed.
Very good. Ab EVM check kare.  15. KTP connects the Control Unit and the Balloting Unit. He switches on the machine and checks whether it is working.
Jaiye assign ho jaiye.
Sir! KTP walks to the other table where the collector sits wit her assistant.
(looking into the file) Kamal Kishore? Aapka booth 237 hai.
Jee Madam. Collector looks up.
Chhota booth hai. Sirf 76 voters.
Madam Gir jungle mein to ek voter ke liye bhi booth bana tha.
I know. Yeh Gir mein nahi Dandkaranya mein hai. Yahan dekho. KTP’s face turns pale. His countenance betrays fright.
Jee Jungle mein? On a map the Collector points to the booth.

Haan. Yahan. Maoist influence kaafi heavy hai, lekin che mahine se poora control administration ke paas hai. Full security milegi. Aapke saath do sahayak jayenge, aur ek BLO bhi hai waha madad ke liye. Aap abhi helicopter se jayenge. KTP moves closer to the Collector and speaks softly.
Mujhe toh City Hall bataya gaya tha.
Bansilal ji ne.
List main banati hoon, Bansilal nahi.

Mujhse ho nahi paega madam. Please Madam. Meri nayi nayi shaadi hui hai. Wife expect kar rahi hai. Main heart patient hoon. Main jungle mein nahi jaunga. Please please! Insert: Newton is suddenly paying complete attention to what is happening at the collector’s table. Back to table:
Suspend kar dijiye. FIR kar dijiye. Magar wahan mat bhejiye. Please. The collector looks at KTP with disdain.
Medical certificate hai?
Ek ghante mein le aunga. Collector waves him away with utter disdain. He darts off She looks at her PA.
Reserve mein se koi jaega?
The jungle is seen from the helicopter pilot’s cockpit. F the window, Newton watches the terrain below.

LOUD SOUND of a helicopter landing on a helipad on a fore hillock. Dust-storm is created as the fan settles. The door is opened. Newton comes out. Behind him, LOKNATH (57) alights, followed by SHAMBHU (30). Between the three they hold the EVM boxes, files and polling material.  17. Newton squints his eyes in the dust and looks around. Unmarked vehicles belonging to the Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) are waiting for them. There are about a doze CRPF constables with guns. The Sub Inspector, KRISHNA SINGH (32) comes towards Newto Newton shakes his hand.
Jai Hind Newton Sir. Sub Inspector Krishna Singh. We can’t hear their voices because of the helicopter’s no
Election party ke baki log kahan hai?
Sirf hum teen hai.
Vanvaas pe. Krishna smiles and nods his head. LOKNATH (CONT’D) Ab yahan se kitna?
Ghante bhar mein pahuch jayenge. Sir, yeh laga lijiye. He passes a tube of mosquito repellent.
Theek se mal lijiye. Iss ilaake mey log goliyon se kum aur malaria se zyada marte hai. Newton, Shambhu, and Loknath rub it on to their hands and faces as they approach their parked jeep.
ROP kaam pe hai.
Aropi? Aropi kaun hai?
R.O.P. Road Opening Party. Raaste mein mines vagerah clear karne. Dariye mat. Ambush ka chance bahut kam hai.  17 18 19 20 18.
Kitna kam?
Dus percent. Loknath gets a coughing fit on hearing it. Shambhu looks like he doing some mental calculation.
(laughs) Ghabrao nahi! Iss area ke hisaab se dus percent kuch nahi hai. As they get into the jeep, Newton asks.
Yeh ‘dus percent’ calculate kaise karte hai?
Four jeeps go in a straight file on the highway that pass through the jungle.
ROP is seen from the windshield. The police radio buzzes constantly- reporting from variou outposts in the jungle. The sounds are muffled.
Picchle chunav mein yahan kehte hai unnees log mare gaye the.

Figure sahi hai. Magar sirf yahan nahi. Poore pradesh mein. Yahan to matdaan kendra aaj kai saal baad laga hai. Yahan ki casualty figure aaj shaam pata chalegi. Newton, Loknath and Shambhu look perturbed.
The sun is setting behind the hills in the distance.
An orange plastic flying Hanuman hangs on the rear view mirror.  19.
(points in the distance) Sir, woh pahad dekh rahe hai? A hillock in the distance glistens like a ghost.
Kya hai wahan?
Pakistan! Newton looks at him with disbelief.
Pichle August tak wahan lal jhande ko salaami di jaati thi.
(laughing) Meri toh abhi tak jahan bhi posting hui hai na, log alag alag jhandon ko salami dete hai.
Jhande aur dande se hi toh desh banta hai!
Yeh naxali area ko Pakistan kyon kehte hai?
Bhagwan jaane sahab. Mere aane se pehle se kehte hai. Dushman meaning Pakistan.
Yeh saara area unke paas tha?

Ab humare control mein hai. Phir bhi khatra to hota hi hai. Jageh jageh mines bichi milti hai. (laughing) Aap log yahan wahan pishaab karte samay savdhaan rehna. Galat jageh moot diya to kaand ho jaega.
Four jeeps travel. Car headlights are on.  20.
The four jeeps turn. The light falls on a BLOWN UP JEEP, the road.
Isi spot pe ambush hua tha. Sau dedh-sau honge unki toli mein. Aadmi aurat sab saath mein chaaron taraf se firing kar rahe the. Aur dus minute mein sab ke sab jungle mein gaayab.
Newton and Loknath look at the blown up jeep.
Yahan? The driver shows his left arm as he continues driving. Ve little is seen in that light.
Choo ke dekho. Bum ka tukda abhi tak andar dhasa hua hai. Loknath touches it reluctantly.
Feel kar sakte ho na? (to Newton) Aap bhi dekho. Newton touches the hand.
Tagda ghaav hai.
Commandant sahab ko to yeh kharoch lagti hai. Medal ke liye NDE maangte hai.
NDE matlab?
Near Death Experience.
The convoy enters the CRPF camp. Barbed wire at the wall. Sandbags with gunners behind it. A sentry opens the gate.  21.
Aa gaya London.
Bhaiya mujhe to neend aane se rahi.
Dariye mat. Yahan ekdum safe hai.
Kitna percent safe? Krishna laughs.
A small group is huddled outside a tent playing carrom. Newton, Loknath and Shambhu watch this from their tent do

Newton sleeps. Suddenly, there’s light on Newton’s face. Newton opens his eyes and sits up. A Gondi man is shining light. He is LAKHMA. Torch light on Newton’s face. His eyes open and he sits u Lakhma puts the torch light on his own face.
Ghabrao nahi, main Lakhma hoon...
Kya time hua? Sab log kahan hai. He checks his watch for the time.
Sade paanch baje gaye. Hum late ho jayenge.
So jaiye Sirji. Sahab abhi abhi aaye hai.
Aa gaye? Loknath! Shambhu!

location: CRPF CAMP- OUTSIDE MESS TENT- NIGHT 27

text: Newton, Loknath and Shambhu walk towards Atma Singh who i scolding a constable. They wait till he is done.  28 22. Atma Singh turns and offers his hand to Loknath.
Jai Hind Kumar Sir. Atma Singh Assistant Commandant. Loknath, who looks taken by Atma Singh’s personality mere shakes his head.

Ji, main hoon. (takes his hand) Newton Kumar, Upper Division Clerk, Collector Office. Yeh Loknath hai. Atma Singh checks Newton out from top to bottom as if re- checking if the EC had indeed sent such a young officer.
Naam bahut adbhut hai hai aapka. Newton. Kisne diya?
(stern, no nonsense) Ji maine. Atma Singh gets the hint and stops smiling.
Yehi hai aapki polling party?
Ek BLO yahan join karega.
BLO? Bhai, yahan local logon ka koi bharosa nahi hai.
Nahi mujhe Collector madam ne khud bola tha ki...
(cuts in) Anda khate ho? Newton is startled. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Egg.
A table is set with breakfast of boiled eggs and bread. T are sitting around the table. Loknath picks one up an egg and checks it out.  23.

Jungli anda hai. Yahan ki murgiyaan bhi krantikaari hai. Ghanta bhar interrogate kiya tab diya anda. Laughter from everyone. Lakhma pours red tea in three chai glasses. Atma takes out a small bottle and pours some whiskey in h tea. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Lenge? Himmat ki dawai hai. Newton shakes his head. Loknath looks at the booze with desire. Newton starts eating. Atma Singh doesn’t like Newton’s attitude.
Polling booth kitni door hai?
(politely) Woh aap mujh pe chhod do. Yahan tak aa gaye bahut hai. Aage safe nahi hai. Vote andar jakar mere aadmi le aayenge. Aap tension mat lo.
Madam ne to bataya tha ki yahan cheh mahine se kuch nahi hua hai.
To hum yahan chor police kyon khel rahe hain? Dekho disturbed area mein chunav aise hi hota hai. Kashmir aur Manipur mein maine khud karaya hain.
Lekin yahan presiding officer main hoon. Newton pulls out his map.
Jis school mein booth hai woh kuch aath kilometer door hai.
Ekdum correct information hai aapki. Wahi se mere aadmi vote layenge.  29 30 24.
Aapka ilaaka hai. Jaise aap kahe. Newton cuts Loknath.
Loknath ji. Please. (to Atma) Humein apni duty karni hai.
Newton ji, inn logon ko kuch nahi padi election ki. Upar se boycott ka elan hua hai. Main likh ke deta hoon koi nahi ayega.
Theek hai phir likh ke dijiye.
Kya?

Aap jo bhi keh rahe ho, writing mey dijiye. Main usse apne collector ko forward kar doonga. Atma Singh is stunned. Long silence. Atma Singh stares in Newton eyes. Newton looks here and there, not wanting to stare back. Finally Atma Singh turns.
Rajendra! BP jacket nikalo! Newton and Loknath look at each other.
Lights from torches. Newton, Loknath and Shambhu are being helped into their v by constables. Atma Singh comes to Newton and tightens hi vest like a corset. Newton gasps for breath.
(under his breath) Sarkari maal hai. Kaske na baandho to goli paar nikal hi jaati hai. He barks instructions on the walkie.
31 25. ATMA SINGH (CONT’D) Alpha to Alpha 4.
Alpha 4 here. Aadesh kare.
Point 44 pe area domination kar ke khabar karo.
Janaab. Jai hind.
In a wide shot, forty men are walking. Only their torch lights are seen. Murmurs are heard. One by one, torches are switched off.
